body:
{"resume": "data:text/plain;base64,", "jobDescription": "Senior Software Engineer - Cloud Platform Team

We are seeking an exceptional Senior Software Engineer to join our Cloud Platform team. You will be responsible for designing and building the next generation of our cloud infrastructure and developer tools.

REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS:
• 5+ years of professional software development experience
• Expert-level proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript and React
• Strong backend development experience with Node.js or Python
• Extensive experience with AWS services (Lambda, S3, DynamoDB, API Gateway)
• Experience with microservices architecture and distributed systems
• Proficiency in containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)
• Strong understanding of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices
• Experience with database design and optimization
• Excellent problem-solving and communication skills

PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:
• AWS certifications (Solutions Architect, Developer)
• Experience with infrastructure as code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
• Knowledge of monitoring and observability tools
• Experience with GraphQL and modern API design
• Background in performance optimization and scalability
• Experience mentoring junior developers

RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Design and develop scalable cloud-native applications
• Build and maintain microservices architecture
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams on product features
• Optimize application performance and ensure high availability
• Mentor team members and contribute to technical decisions
• Participate in code reviews and maintain coding standards
• Stay current with emerging technologies and best practices

TECH STACK:
• Frontend: React, TypeScript, Material-UI
• Backend: Node.js, Python, Express.js, FastAPI
• Cloud: AWS (Lambda, S3, DynamoDB, API Gateway, CloudFormation)
• Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
• DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Terraform
• Monitoring: CloudWatch, DataDog, Prometheus", "outputFormat": "word"}
